General.Name: KST Beteiligungs AG
General.Description: KST Beteiligungs AG is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm provides its services to Institutional and private investors. It invests in small and mid-cap stocks in German-speaking countries. It also invest in classic equity investments in the form of convertible or option bonds. It also focuses on long-term investment approach. KST Beteiligungs AG was founded in October, 1984 and is based in Grafenau, Germany with additional office in Stuttgart, Germany.
